itemDescription: British seaman and a Royal Navy officer

wikipedia_page.main: Commodore Raymond Hart  (24 June 1913 – 6 August 1999) was a British seaman and a Royal Navy officer who served during the Second World War.

response: Her new Commanding Officer was Lt. Cdr. Raymond Hart DSC, an experienced and successful ASW officer.
| Captain Raymond Hart || HMS Undine || April 1957-October 1958
*Raymond Hart, 86, British seaman and a Royal Navy officer.
